goal.en: Give an introduction to topology on high dimensional spaces. The use of topology in the discussion of limit (of sequences), continuity of a function, etc. Discuss the theory of calculus for functions of several variables, transformation of spaces, change of variables for integrals, inverse function theorem, etc. The materials will be useful for students who hope to continue to pursue the study of more advanced mathematics.
goal.ch: 加深數學分析的學習，學習Topology的基本概念，應用topology的語言及思想來討論極限的相關問題。 學習多變數函數的微分及積分理論，討論高維度空間的變換，積分的變數變換，反函數定理，隱函數定理，這些知識是學生學習高階數學的基礎。

content.en: The course this semester will cover the following topics: Chapter 7 infinite series of functions, Chapter 8 Euclidean spaces, Chapter 9 Convergence in R^n and Chapter 10 Metric spaces. It will be adjusted according to the learning level of students.
content.ch: 這學期的課程內容，預計涵蓋教科書的第七章 infinite series of functions 第八章 Euclidean spaces 第九章 Convergence in R^n 與第十章 Metric spaces 視同學學習程度調整。

flex_desc.en:
Besides the 1st to 16th week courses, flexible 
teaching methods are also used to the 17th and 18th 
weeks of teaching activities. Especially for students 
whose learning progress is relatively slow, I will give 
them tutorial courses.
flex_desc.ch: 除了第1～16週課程外，另以彈性教學方式規劃第17、18週教學活動。特別是對於學習進度較遲緩的學生，會適時提供補救教學。
